definition: to read and interpret ancient texts/to decipher
to explain/to release/Buddha (abbr. for 釋迦牟尼|释迦牟尼[Shi4 jia1 mou2 ni2])/Buddhism
comma/phrase marked by pause
to read/to study/reading of word (i.e. pronunciation), similar to 拼音[pin1 yin1]

sentences.english: It is believed that the decoding of these earlier forms is only a matter of time.
sentences.chinese: 據信，陶符文字的釋讀僅僅是一個時間問題。

sentences.english: But for reasons, there some questions in the words explanation of this book.
sentences.chinese: 由於種種原因，該書在文字釋讀上存在一些問題。

sentences.english: Warring States Period turtles Pui the text on the state of Chu was mainly refers to the currency in circulation recorded text.
sentences.chinese: 一是對戰國時代龜貝和布幣上的文字進行釋讀和考析。

sentences.english: Second is the Warring States Period knife coins family Interpretation of the text.
sentences.chinese: 二是對戰國時代刀幣家族的文字釋讀。

sentences.english: My research has turned to deciphering Khitan characters.
sentences.chinese: 我的研究方向轉到了契丹文字釋讀方面。

sentences.english: This is why we reappraise the Great Learning from a modern philosophical perspective here.
sentences.chinese: 這正是我們重新釋讀《大學》的理由。

sentences.english: The interpretation of the novel theme is the core of literary appreciation.
sentences.chinese: 小說主題的釋讀，是文學釋讀的核心。

sentences.english: The interpretation of the novel theme is the core of literary appreciation.
sentences.chinese: 小說主題的釋讀，是文學釋讀的核心。

sentences.english: The social function of Chinese characters is realized by interpretation and writing.
sentences.chinese: 漢字社會功能的實現是通過釋讀與書寫來進行的。

definition: to make a catalogue/catalogue/list
revision
study of classic texts, including interpretation, glossaries and commentaries
philology
to copy (a text) from person to person/(of a text) to be transmitted by copying
variant character/loan word/variant written form (for the same word)/different edition
to transcribe/to make a fair copy
Chinese phonetics (concerned also with rhyme in poetry)
to revise/to examine and revise
paleography
variant of 圖像|图像[tu2 xiang4]
Mawangdui in Changsha, Hunan, a recent Han dynasty archaeological site
to comment on/commentary
complete and accurate
letter/also written 書札|书札
circumstantial evidence
